thread.section_title: Mercure Paris Montmartre Sacre Coeur - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Location
thread.title_full: Great Location - Review of Mercure Paris Montmartre Sacre Coeur, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Christy-Gracie
title: Great Location
text: Stayed in March of 2017. Really great location. Rooms are a little small, but clean and have modern feel. Little mini fridge and pot for heating water. Nice breakfast room. The patio bar wasn't open for the season yet, but looked nice. There is so much to see in Paris that we did'nt spend much time in our rooms; i rather put a premium on the location.
